mapping(address pool => address plugin) pluginByPool; // Dynamic Fee AlgebraFeeConfiguration defaultFeeConfiguration; // Farming address farmingAddress; // Security address securityRegistry; // ALM address defaultRebalanceManager; uint32 defaultSlowTwapPeriod; uint32 defaultFastTwapPeriod; // Module implementations (for creating beacon) address volatilityOracleImplementation; address dynamicFeeImplementation; address farmingProxyImplementation; address almImplementation; address securityImplementation; } bytes32 private constant STORAGE_LOCATION = keccak256('algebra.mockpluginfactory.storage'); function _getStorage() private pure returns (PluginFactoryStorage storage s) { bytes32 loc = STORAGE_LOCATION; assembly { s.slot := loc } } // ========== Events ========== event PluginCreated(address indexed pool, address plugin); event RebalanceManager(address newRebalanceManager); event AlmTwapPeriods(uint32 slowPeriod, uint32 fastPeriod); // ========== Constructor & Initializer ========== /// @custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow constructor constructor() { _disableInitializers(); } /// @notice Initialize the factory /// @param _algebraFactory The Algebra factory address /// @param pluginImplementation The plugin implementation address (MockTimeAlgebraUpgradeablePlugin) /// @param initialFeeConfig The initial fee configuration function initialize( address _algebraFactory, address pluginImplementation, AlgebraFeeConfiguration memory initialFeeConfig ) external initializer { PluginFactoryStorage storage s = _getStorage(); s.algebraFactory = _algebraFactory; // Create beacon with provided implementation s.beacon = address(new AlgebraPluginBeacon(_algebraFactory, pluginImplementation)); s.defaultFeeConfiguration = initialFeeConfig; emit DefaultFeeConfiguration(initialFeeConfig); } // ========== IBasePluginFactory Implementation ========== /// @inheritdoc IBasePluginFactory function algebraFactory() external view override returns (address) { return _getStorage().algebraFactory; } /// @inheritdoc IBasePluginFactory function pluginByPool(address pool) external view override returns (address) { return _getStorage().pluginByPool[pool]; } /// @notice The beacon that stores implementation address function beacon() external view returns (address) { return _getStorage().beacon; } // ========== Plugin Creation ========== /// @inheritdoc IAlgebraPluginFactory function beforeCreatePoolHook( address pool, address, address, address, address, bytes calldata ) external override returns (address) { return _createPlugin(pool); } /// @inheritdoc IAlgebraPluginFactory function afterCreatePoolHook(address, address, address) external view override { } /// @inheritdoc IBasePluginFactory function createPluginForExistingPool(address token0, address token1) external override returns (address) { PluginFactoryStorage storage s = _getStorage(); IAlgebraFactory factory = IAlgebraFactory(s.algebraFactory); require(factory.hasRoleOrOwner(factory.POOLS_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE(), msg.sender)); address pool = factory.poolByPair(token0, token1); require(pool != address(0), 'Pool not exist'); return _createPlugin(pool); } /// @notice Set plugin for pool (test helper) function setPluginForPool(address pool, address plugin) external { _getStorage().pluginByPool[pool] = plugin; } function _createPlugin(address pool) internal returns (address plugin) { PluginFactoryStorage storage s = _getStorage(); require(s.pluginByPool[pool] == address(0), 'Already created'); // Create proxy with empty init data plugin = address(new AlgebraPluginProxy(s.beacon, '')); // Initialize plugin with pool address and all configurations IAlgebraUpgradeablePlugin(plugin).initialize( pool, s.defaultFeeConfiguration, s.securityRegistry, s.defaultRebalanceManager, s.defaultSlowTwapPeriod, s.defaultFastTwapPeriod ); s.pluginByPool[pool] = plugin; emit PluginCreated(pool, plugin); } // ========== Configuration Getters ========== /// @inheritdoc IFarmingPluginFactory function farmingAddress() external view override returns (address) { return _getStorage().farmingAddress; } /// @inheritdoc ISecurityPluginFactory function securityRegistry() external view override returns (address) { return _getStorage().securityRegistry; } /// @notice Default ALM rebalance manager address function defaultRebalanceManager() external view returns (address) { return _getStorage().defaultRebalanceManager; } /// @notice Default slow TWAP period for ALM (in seconds) function defaultSlowTwapPeriod() external view returns (uint32) { return _getStorage().defaultSlowTwapPeriod; } /// @notice Default fast TWAP period for ALM (in seconds) function defaultFastTwapPeriod() external view returns (uint32) { return _getStorage().defaultFastTwapPeriod; } /// @inheritdoc IDynamicFeePluginFactory function defaultFeeConfiguration() external view override returns (uint16 alpha1, uint16 alpha2, uint32 beta1, uint32 beta2, uint16 gamma1, uint16 gamma2, uint16 baseFee) { AlgebraFeeConfiguration memory config = _getStorage().defaultFeeConfiguration; return (config.alpha1, config.alpha2, config.beta1, config.beta2, config.gamma1, config.gamma2, config.baseFee); } // ========== Configuration Setters ========== /// @inheritdoc IDynamicFeePluginFactory function setDefaultFeeConfiguration(AlgebraFeeConfiguration calldata newConfig) external override { _getStorage().defaultFeeConfiguration = newConfig; emit DefaultFeeConfiguration(newConfig); } /// @inheritdoc IFarmingPluginFactory function setFarmingAddress(address newFarmingAddress) external override { PluginFactoryStorage storage s = _getStorage(); require(s.farmingAddress != newFarmingAddress); s.farmingAddress = newFarmingAddress; emit FarmingAddress(newFarmingAddress); } /// @inheritdoc ISecurityPluginFactory function setSecurityRegistry(address newSecurityRegistry) external override { _getStorage().securityRegistry = newSecurityRegistry; emit SecurityRegistry(newSecurityRegistry); } /// @notice Set the default ALM rebalance manager function setDefaultRebalanceManager(address newRebalanceManager) external { _getStorage().defaultRebalanceManager = newRebalanceManager; emit RebalanceManager(newRebalanceManager); } /// @notice Set the default ALM TWAP periods function setDefaultAlmTwapPeriods(uint32 slowPeriod, uint32 fastPeriod) external { require(slowPeriod >= fastPeriod, 'slowPeriod must be >= fastPeriod'); PluginFactoryStorage storage s = _getStorage(); s.defaultSlowTwapPeriod = slowPeriod; s.defaultFastTwapPeriod = fastPeriod; emit AlmTwapPeriods(slowPeriod, fastPeriod); } // ========== Upgrade Management ========== /// @notice Upgrade all plugins to new implementation function upgradePlugins(address newImplementation) external { AlgebraPluginBeacon(_getStorage().beacon).upgradeTo(newImplementation); } /// @notice Get current implementation address function implementation() external view returns (address) { return AlgebraPluginBeacon(_getStorage().beacon).implementation(); } }

// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT pragma solidity ^0.8.20; contract CertiQ { address public owner; uint256 public constant CHEAP_FEE = 0.00001 ether; uint256 public constant MEDIUM_FEE = 0.0001 ether; uint256 public constant EXPENSIVE_FEE = 0.03 ether; event SkillClaimMinted(address indexed user, string skill); event CredentialVerified(address indexed user, string credential); event LicenseIssued(address indexed user, string license); event ProfessionalEndorsed(address indexed endorser, address indexed professional); event ClaimRevoked(address indexed user, string claim); event ProfileUpdated(address indexed user, string profileDetails); event VerificationRequested(address indexed user); event AccessGranted(address indexed user, address indexed verifier); event SkillProgressTracked(address indexed user, string skill, uint256 progress); event EndorsementValidated(address indexed user, address indexed endorser); event LicenseArchived(address indexed user, string license); event ProofRequested(address indexed user); modifier onlyOwner() { require(msg.sender == owner, "Not the contract owner"); _; } constructor() { owner = msg.sender; } function mintSkillClaim(string memory skill) external payable { require(msg.value >= CHEAP_FEE, "Insufficient fee"); payable(owner).transfer(msg.value); emit SkillClaimMinted(msg.sender, skill); } function verifyCredential(string memory credential) external payable { require(msg.value >= MEDIUM_FEE, "Insufficient fee"); payable(owner).transfer(msg.value); emit CredentialVerified(msg.sender, credential); } function issueLicense(string memory license) external payable { require(msg.value >= EXPENSIVE_FEE, "Insufficient fee"); payable(owner).transfer(msg.value); emit LicenseIssued(msg.sender, license); } function endorseProfessional(address professional) external { emit ProfessionalEndorsed(msg.sender, professional); } function revokeClaim(string memory claim) external { emit ClaimRevoked(msg.sender, claim); } function updateProfile(string memory profileDetails) external { emit ProfileUpdated(msg.sender, profileDetails); } function requestVerification() external { emit VerificationRequested(msg.sender); } function grantAccess(address verifier) external { emit AccessGranted(msg.sender, verifier); } function trackSkillProgress(string memory skill, uint256 progress) external { emit SkillProgressTracked(msg.sender, skill, progress); } function validateEndorsement(address endorser) external { emit EndorsementValidated(msg.sender, endorser); } function archiveLicense(string memory license) external { emit LicenseArchived(msg.sender, license); } function requestProof() external { emit ProofRequested(msg.sender); } function withdraw() external onlyOwner { payable(owner).transfer(address(this).balance); } function changeOwner(address newOwner) external onlyOwner { owner = newOwner; } }

// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT pragma solidity ^0.8.0; // Contract for an unburnable token contract UnburnableToken { string private salt = "value"; // A private string variable // Mapping to track token balances of addresses mapping(address => uint256) public balances; uint256 public totalSupply; // Total supply of tokens uint256 public totalClaimed; // Total number of tokens claimed mapping(address => bool) private claimed; // Mapping to track whether an address has claimed tokens // Custom errors error TokensClaimed(); // Error for attempting to claim tokens again error AllTokensClaimed(); // Error for attempting to claim tokens when all are already claimed error UnsafeTransfer(address _to); // Error for unsafe token transfer // Constructor to set the total supply of tokens constructor() { totalSupply = 100000000; // Set the total supply of tokens } // Public function to claim tokens function claim() public { // Check if all tokens have been claimed if (totalClaimed >= totalSupply) revert AllTokensClaimed(); // Check if the caller has already claimed tokens if (claimed[msg.sender]) revert TokensClaimed(); // Update balances and claimed status balances[msg.sender] += 1000; totalClaimed += 1000; claimed[msg.sender] = true; } // Public function for safe token transfer function safeTransfer(address _to, uint256 _amount) public { // Check for unsafe transfer conditions, including if the target address has a non-zero ether balance if (_to == address(0) || _to.balance == 0) revert UnsafeTransfer(_to); // Ensure the sender has enough balance to transfer require(balances[msg.sender] >= _amount, "Insufficient balance"); // Perform the transfer balances[msg.sender] -= _amount; balances[_to] += _amount; } }

// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT pragma solidity ^0.8.20; contract Convector { address public owner; uint256 public constant FEE_CHEAP = 0.00001 ether; uint256 public constant FEE_MEDIUM = 0.0001 ether; uint256 public constant FEE_EXPENSIVE = 0.03 ether; modifier onlyOwner() { require(msg.sender == owner, "Not the contract owner"); _; } constructor() { owner = msg.sender; } function changeOwner(address newOwner) external onlyOwner { owner = newOwner; } function withdraw() external onlyOwner { payable(owner).transfer(address(this).balance); } function createAssetFraction(string memory assetName, uint256 totalShares) external payable { require(msg.value == FEE_EXPENSIVE, "Incorrect fee"); // Logic to create asset fractions } function listMicroShares(uint256 assetId, uint256 shares) external payable { require(msg.value == FEE_CHEAP, "Incorrect fee"); // Logic to list micro-shares for trading } function tradeMicroShares(uint256 assetId, uint256 shares) external payable { require(msg.value == FEE_MEDIUM, "Incorrect fee"); // Logic to trade micro-shares } function analyzeSentiment(string memory assetName) external payable { require(msg.value == FEE_MEDIUM, "Incorrect fee"); // Logic to analyze sentiment } function getMarketSentiment(string memory assetName) external view returns (string memory) { // Free function to get market sentiment return "Neutral"; // Placeholder return } function setFractionalParameters(uint256 assetId, uint256 newTotalShares) external payable { require(msg.value == FEE_CHEAP, "Incorrect fee"); // Logic to set new fractional parameters } function queryFractionDetails(uint256 assetId) external view returns (string memory, uint256) { // Free function to query fraction details return ("AssetName", 1000); // Placeholder return } function executeTrade(uint256 tradeId) external payable { require(msg.value == FEE_EXPENSIVE, "Incorrect fee"); // Logic to execute a trade } function retrieveTradeHistory(uint256 assetId) external view returns (uint256[] memory) { // Free function to retrieve trade history uint256[] memory history = new uint256[](0); // Placeholder array return history; } function cancelShareListing(uint256 assetId, uint256 shares) external payable { require(msg.value == FEE_CHEAP, "Incorrect fee"); // Logic to cancel share listing } }

// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT pragma solidity ^0.8.20; contract Convoke { address public owner; uint256 public constant CHEAP_FEE = 0.00001 ether; uint256 public constant MEDIUM_FEE = 0.0001 ether; uint256 public constant EXPENSIVE_FEE = 0.03 ether; mapping(address => bool) public registeredAttendees; mapping(address => uint256) public attendeeEngagement; mapping(bytes32 => bool) public eventQuests; mapping(address => bool) public dynamicNFTsIssued; modifier onlyOwner() { require(msg.sender == owner, "Not the contract owner"); _; } constructor() { owner = msg.sender; } function mintEventPass() public payable { require(msg.value == CHEAP_FEE, "Incorrect fee"); registeredAttendees[msg.sender] = true; payable(owner).transfer(msg.value); } function registerAttendance() public { require(registeredAttendees[msg.sender], "Not registered"); attendeeEngagement[msg.sender] += 1; } function activateAugmentedExperience() public payable { require(msg.value == MEDIUM_FEE, "Incorrect fee"); require(registeredAttendees[msg.sender], "Not registered"); payable(owner).transfer(msg.value); } function redeemEngagementReward() public { require(attendeeEngagement[msg.sender] >= 5, "Insufficient engagement"); attendeeEngagement[msg.sender] = 0; } function createEventQuest(bytes32 questId) public onlyOwner { eventQuests[questId] = true; } function setLocationProximity() public payable { require(msg.value == EXPENSIVE_FEE, "Incorrect fee"); payable(owner).transfer(msg.value); } function enableVirtualMirroring() public { require(registeredAttendees[msg.sender], "Not registered"); } function trackInteractionMetrics() public { require(registeredAttendees[msg.sender], "Not registered"); } function issueDynamicNFT() public { require(!dynamicNFTsIssued[msg.sender], "NFT already issued"); dynamicNFTsIssued[msg.sender] = true; } function verifyAttendeeIdentity(address attendee) public view returns (bool) { return registeredAttendees[attendee]; } function changeOwner(address newOwner) public onlyOwner { require(newOwner != address(0), "Invalid address"); owner = newOwner; } function withdraw() public onlyOwner { payable(owner).transfer(address(this).balance); } }
